Nightlight/Windlord::


"NIGHTLIGHT COME IN BASE!!!!!" shouted worried Windlord, and yelled 
to BH "You're telling lies, Maximals were designed with the purpouse 
of protect not kill... alway that is possible Maximals don't fight... 
they don't destroy inocents children,  -their hobby isn't kill... "


Nightlight didn't move where she was. Windlord shot 25 times against 
BH.
